This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Sitting on my deck, my eye caught a bright glowing fire red/orange large circle that was hovering for a while then quickly changed directions and then disappeared.
divs: sighting detailssitting on. deck in my back yard talking with my boyfriend as i looked out into the night sky. i watched the plans fly over for years and were used to them, but this was not a plane. this was a large circular object hovering displaying a bright orange\fire red glow. so bright and steady you could not look away. the object hovered for 2-3 minutes then made sudden changes in movement dropping down and then up and then slowly to the east and then towards us again until the light randomly disappeared after a total of 5 minutes. completely shocked and speechless by what was seem by my boyfriend and i.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
